a: وَالطُّورِ
t: By the mount

a: وَكِتَابٍ مَسْطُورٍ
t: And [by] a Book inscribed

a: فِي رَقٍّ مَنْشُورٍ
t: In parchment spread open

a: وَالْبَيْتِ الْمَعْمُورِ
t: And [by] the frequented House

a: وَالسَّقْفِ الْمَرْفُوعِ
t: And [by] the heaven raised high

a: وَالْبَحْرِ الْمَسْجُورِ
t: And [by] the sea filled [with fire],

a: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَوَاقِعٌ
t: Indeed, the punishment of your Lord will occur.

a: مَا لَهُ مِنْ دَافِعٍ
t: Of it there is no preventer.

a: يَوْمَ تَمُورُ السَّمَاءُ مَوْرًا
t: On the Day the heaven will sway with circular motion

a: وَتَسِيرُ الْجِبَالُ سَيْرًا
t: And the mountains will pass on, departing -

a: فَوَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
t: Then woe, that Day, to the deniers,

a: الَّذِينَ هُمْ فِي خَوْضٍ يَلْعَبُونَ
t: Who are in [empty] discourse amusing themselves.

a: يَوْمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا
t: The Day they are thrust toward the fire of Hell with a [violent] thrust, [its angels will say],

a: هَٰذِهِ النَّارُ الَّتِي كُنْتُمْ بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
t: "This is the Fire which you used to deny.

a: أَفَسِحْرٌ هَٰذَا أَمْ أَنْتُمْ لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
t: Then is this magic, or do you not see?

a: اصْلَوْهَا فَاصْبِرُوا أَوْ لَا تَصْبِرُوا سَوَاءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنْتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
t: [Enter to] burn therein; then be patient or impatient -  it is all the same for you.  You are only being recompensed [for] what you used to do."

a: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ وَنَعِيمٍ
t: Indeed, the righteous will be in gardens and pleasure,

a: فَاكِهِينَ بِمَا آتَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ وَوَقَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ عَذَابَ الْجَحِيمِ
t: Enjoying what their Lord has given them, and their Lord protected them from the punishment of Hellfire.

a: كُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا هَنِيئًا بِمَا كُنْتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
t: [They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do."

a: مُتَّكِئِينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مَصْفُوفَةٍ ۖ وَزَوَّجْنَاهُمْ بِحُورٍ عِينٍ
t: They will be reclining on thrones lined up, and We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes.

a: وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَاتَّبَعَتْهُمْ ذُرِّيَّتُهُمْ بِإِيمَانٍ أَلْحَقْنَا بِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَمَا أَلَتْنَاهُمْ مِنْ عَمَلِهِمْ مِنْ شَيْءٍ ۚ كُلُّ امْرِئٍ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٌ
t: And those who believed and whose descendants followed them in faith -  We will join with them their descendants, and We will not deprive them of anything of their deeds. Every person, for what he earned, is retained.

a: وَأَمْدَدْنَاهُمْ بِفَاكِهَةٍ وَلَحْمٍ مِمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
t: And We will provide them with fruit and meat from whatever they desire.

a: يَتَنَازَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا لَا لَغْوٌ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأْثِيمٌ
t: They will exchange with one another a cup [of wine] wherein [results] no ill speech or commission of sin.

a: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ غِلْمَانٌ لَهُمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ لُؤْلُؤٌ مَكْنُونٌ
t: There will circulate among them [servant] boys [especially] for them, as if they were pearls well-protected.

a: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
t: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.

a: قَالُوا إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبْلُ فِي أَهْلِنَا مُشْفِقِينَ
t: They will say, "Indeed, we were previously among our people fearful [of displeasing Allah ].

a: فَمَنَّ اللَّهُ عَلَيْنَا وَوَقَانَا عَذَابَ السَّمُومِ
t: So Allah conferred favor upon us and protected us from the punishment of the Scorching Fire.

a: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِنْ قَبْلُ نَدْعُوهُ ۖ إِنَّهُ هُوَ الْبَرُّ الرَّحِيمُ
t: Indeed, we used to supplicate Him before. Indeed, it is He who is the Beneficent, the Merciful."

a: فَذَكِّرْ فَمَا أَنْتَ بِنِعْمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٍ وَلَا مَجْنُونٍ
t: So remind [O Muhammad], for you are not, by the favor of your Lord, a soothsayer or a madman.

a: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٌ نَتَرَبَّصُ بِهِ رَيْبَ الْمَنُونِ
t: Or do they say [of you], "A poet for whom we await a misfortune of time?"

a: قُلْ تَرَبَّصُوا فَإِنِّي مَعَكُمْ مِنَ الْمُتَرَبِّصِينَ
t: Say, "Wait, for indeed I am, with you, among the waiters."

a: أَمْ تَأْمُرُهُمْ أَحْلَامُهُمْ بِهَٰذَا ۚ أَمْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
t: Or do their minds command them to [say] this, or are they a transgressing people?

a: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُ ۚ بَلْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
t: Or do they say, "He has made it up"? Rather, they do not believe.

a: فَلْيَأْتُوا بِحَدِيثٍ مِثْلِهِ إِنْ كَانُوا صَادِقِينَ
t: Then let them produce a statement like it, if they should be truthful.

a: أَمْ خُلِقُوا مِنْ غَيْرِ شَيْءٍ أَمْ هُمُ الْخَالِقُونَ
t: Or were they created by nothing, or were they the creators [of themselves]?

a: أَمْ خَلَقُوا السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ ۚ بَلْ لَا يُوقِنُونَ
t: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? Rather, they are not certain.

a: أَمْ عِنْدَهُمْ خَزَائِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمْ هُمُ الْمُصَيْطِرُونَ
t: Or have they the depositories [containing the provision] of your Lord? Or are they the controllers [of them]?

a: أَمْ لَهُمْ سُلَّمٌ يَسْتَمِعُونَ فِيهِ ۖ فَلْيَأْتِ مُسْتَمِعُهُمْ بِسُلْطَانٍ مُبِينٍ
t: Or have they a stairway [into the heaven] upon which they listen? Then let their listener produce a clear authority.

a: أَمْ لَهُ الْبَنَاتُ وَلَكُمُ الْبَنُونَ
t: Or has He daughters while you have sons?

a: أَمْ تَسْأَلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُمْ مِنْ مَغْرَمٍ مُثْقَلُونَ
t: Or do you, [O Muhammad], ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down?

a: أَمْ عِنْدَهُمُ الْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ
t: Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down?

a: أَمْ يُرِيدُونَ كَيْدًا ۖ فَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا هُمُ الْمَكِيدُونَ
t: Or do they intend a plan? But those who disbelieve -  they are the object of a plan.

a: أَمْ لَهُمْ إِلَٰهٌ غَيْرُ اللَّهِ ۚ سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
t: Or have they a deity other than Allah ? Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him.

a: وَإِنْ يَرَوْا كِسْفًا مِنَ السَّمَاءِ سَاقِطًا يَقُولُوا سَحَابٌ مَرْكُومٌ
t: And if they were to see a fragment from the sky falling, they would say, "[It is merely] clouds heaped up."

a: فَذَرْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَاقُوا يَوْمَهُمُ الَّذِي فِيهِ يُصْعَقُونَ
t: So leave them until they meet their Day in which they will be struck insensible -

a: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِي عَنْهُمْ كَيْدُهُمْ شَيْئًا وَلَا هُمْ يُنْصَرُونَ
t: The Day their plan will not avail them at all, nor will they be helped.

a: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا عَذَابًا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
t: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a punishment before that, but most of them do not know.

a: وَاصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا ۖ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
t: And be patient, [O Muhammad], for the decision of your Lord, for indeed, you are in Our eyes. And exalt [ Allah ] with praise of your Lord when you arise.

a: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَإِدْبَارَ النُّجُومِ
t: And in a part of the night exalt Him and after [the setting of] the stars.
